title: 装除了小地图之外的MOD都会提示出错：
author: 明潋如水
txt_content:
装MODLOADER也出错，装内置修改器先是没反应，然后今天终于有反应了：Minecraft has crashed!  = =


出错提示：
      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error

A full error report has been saved to D:\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-03-02_18.04.31-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

Full report at:
D:\Minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-03-02_18.04.31-client.txt
Please show that file to Mojang, NOT just this screen!

replies.author: 我被盗号了
replies.txt_content: Modloader与Forge冲突，你这个问题是你电脑的事啊

replies.txt_content:
我被盗号了 发表于 2013-3-3 10:03 
Modloader与Forge冲突，你这个问题是你电脑的事啊
????我没有装FORGE啊？

replies.author: 明潋如水
replies.txt_content:
专业坑爹三十年 发表于 2013-3-3 11:45 
骚年，装forge吧，MODLOADER必须要拖入minecraft.jar
我装MODLOADER时拉进去了结果就报错了= =

replies.author: 明潋如水
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 明潋如水 于 2013-3-3 22:10 编辑 
专业坑爹三十年 发表于 2013-3-3 12:09 
什么意思，装了MODLOADER不能再装FORGE，装了FORGE不能再装MODLOADER
我装MODLOADER时什么也没有装，按照教程把MODLOADER拖入minecraft.jar，结果打开游戏就报错，所以我认为我的故障应该不是与FORGE的冲突吧。难道我的电脑自带FORGE？= =
